verbs.description: Former New York City Mayor Rudy Giuliani – the newest member of President Trump 's Russia - [ARG2: probe] - [V: focused] [ARG1: legal team] – sat down with Special Counsel Robert Mueller on Tuesday .

[ARG1: Former New York City Mayor Rudy Giuliani – the newest member of President Trump 's Russia - probe - focused legal team –] [V: sat] down [ARG2: with Special Counsel Robert Mueller] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] .
